parameters.query:
WITH sequencia_calc AS (
  SELECT
    q.usuario_id,
    q.sequencia_atual,
    q.sequencia_recorde,
    q.meta_sequencia_codigo,
    q.proxima_meta_codigo,
    q.ultima_conversa_em,
    lc.ultima_conversa_real,
    CASE
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 30 THEN 'streak_030'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 25 THEN 'streak_025'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 20 THEN 'streak_020'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 15 THEN 'streak_015'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 10 THEN 'streak_010'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 7 THEN 'streak_007'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 5 THEN 'streak_005'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual >= 3 THEN 'streak_003'
      ELSE 'streak_003'
    END AS expected_meta,
    CASE
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 3 THEN 'streak_003'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 5 THEN 'streak_005'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 7 THEN 'streak_007'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 10 THEN 'streak_010'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 15 THEN 'streak_015'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 20 THEN 'streak_020'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 25 THEN 'streak_025'
      WHEN q.sequencia_atual < 30 THEN 'streak_030'
      ELSE 'streak_030'
    END AS expected_next
  FROM public.quest_estado_usuario q
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT usuario_id, MAX(data_conversa) AS ultima_conversa_real
    FROM public.usr_chat
    GROUP BY usuario_id
  ) lc ON lc.usuario_id = q.usuario_id
),
avaliado AS (
  SELECT
    sc.*,
    array_remove(ARRAY[
      CASE WHEN sc.sequencia_recorde < sc.sequencia_atual THEN 'recorde_menor_que_atual' END,
      CASE WHEN sc.meta_sequencia_codigo IS DISTINCT FROM sc.expected_meta THEN 'meta_sequencia_incorreta' END,
      CASE WHEN sc.proxima_meta_codigo IS DISTINCT FROM sc.expected_next THEN 'proxima_meta_incorreta' END,
      CASE WHEN sc.ultima_conversa_real IS NOT NULL AND sc.ultima_conversa_em IS DISTINCT FROM sc.ultima_conversa_real THEN 'ultima_conversa_desatualizada' END
    ], NULL) AS problemas
  FROM sequencia_calc sc
)
SELECT
  usuario_id,
  problemas,
  jsonb_build_object(
    'sequencia_atual', sequencia_atual,
    'sequencia_recorde', sequencia_recorde,
    'meta_sequencia_codigo', meta_sequencia_codigo,
    'expected_meta', expected_meta,
    'proxima_meta_codigo', proxima_meta_codigo,
    'expected_proxima', expected_next,
    'ultima_conversa_em', ultima_conversa_em,
    'ultima_conversa_real', ultima_conversa_real
  ) AS contexto
FROM avaliado
WHERE array_length(problemas, 1) > 0;
